name: En avant de demain
description:
3D Game made for a jam.

It's about a horse named "De demain", so the hero (=an ugly me) says "En avant, de damain".

Each time you jump, you lose part of your characters. If you lose your head, you die.

I'll probably work some more on it to add stuff. There's just 3 little levels right now.



Also, the .rar includes 2 other .exe I madedurring the gamejam.
